text:
<@U6QFVRJNB>, <@U02DHRR2L> Thanks for the assist. I've got it working. Tentatively the core problem appears to have been that a rerun of .demo-run.sh was not picking up changes to my private-content/secrets file.
Thanks for the cool tool and much better that average documentation!

the `demo-run.sh` script just front-ends the `bin/control.sh` piece - there is a "cleanup" argument to control.sh you can you use to wipe your environment between test runs - use with caution - it will delete things like locally generated SSH keys, etc... and run `terraform destroy`, etc...
the cleanup also resets the secrets file
